events.message: The applicant submitted the personal loan application seeking funds for medical expenses.
The loan was categorised under Personal Loan due to keywords indicating medical and personal use.
Loan officer Sarah Johnson was assigned to the case to manage further processing and communication.
Initial review completed, verifying applicant’s eligibility and reviewing submitted details closely.
Request sent to the applicant for additional medical bills and proof of income to proceed further.
Applicant submitted all requested documents including medical receipts and recent pay slips promptly.
Credit check completed, showing a satisfactory credit score that meets lending criteria.
Risk assessment performed based on credit history, income stability and loan purpose.
Loan offer was presented to the applicant with favorable interest rates and repayment terms.
Applicant responded positively agreeing to the terms and requesting minor clarifications on fees.
Loan officer approved the application considering all criteria satisfactorily met by the applicant.
Funds were disbursed to applicant’s account as per the approved loan amount and schedule.
Follow-up call was made to confirm receipt of funds and address any questions from the applicant.
The personal loan application case was formally closed after successful funding and follow-up.
